interestingcomments.content: I received a form by e-mail to send my hood in to be modded, but I really like it in its current form. Has anyone found any place where you can buy the filter shown in posts 219, 221 and 223? I corresponded with the vendor concerning the Alto filter, but was advised it wouldn't fit the 50mm BC. Also, for those who have had their hood modified, do you have any concerns regarding the weight now being supported by the filter threads on the front of the lens? Thank you in advance!
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: i received a form by e-mail to send my hood in to be modded, but i really like it in its current form. has anyone -----> found !!!  -----> any !!!  -----> place !!!  where you can buy the filter shown in posts 219, 221 and 223? i corresponded with the vendor concerning the alto filter, but was advised it wouldn't fit the 50mm bc. also, for those who have had their hood modified, do you have any concerns regarding the weight now being supported by the filter threads on the front of the lens? thank you in advance!
